title: MOTOROLA G10 Power (Breeze Blue, 64 GB)  (4 GB RAM)

product_specification.In The Box: Handset, Charger, USB Cable, User Guide, SIM Tool
product_specification.Other Display Features: 20:09 Display Aspect Ratio, Anti Fingerprint Coating, Active Area-Touch Panel (AA-TP): 85%
product_specification.Operating Frequency: 2G GSM: B2/B3/B5/B8, 3G WCDMA: B1/B2/B4/B5/B8, 4G LTE: B1/B2/B3/B4/B5/B7/B8/B20/B38/B40/B41
product_specification.Primary Camera Features: Quad Rear Camera Setup: 48MP Main + 8MP Wide + 2MP Macro + 2MP Depth Sensor
product_specification.Sensors: Fingerprint Reader, Proximity Sensor, Accelerometer, Ambient Light Sensor
product_specification.Other Features: Face Unlock, IP52 Rated Water Repellant, 2x2 MIMO, 20W Charger
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year on Handset and 6 Months on Accessories

product_description.Powerful Battery: With the 6000 mAh battery, you can use the mobile phone for long hours on a single charge. This way, you don’t have to worry about running out of battery soon. This way, you can stream content, listen to music, browse, and much more for a long time.
product_description.Quad Camera with Night Vision: No matter the angle or light, the 48 MP quad-camera system will help you take beautiful pictures at all times. The Quad Pixel technology and the night vision mode help make all the pictures you take look vivid, clear, and sharp.
product_description.ThinkShield: Thanks to ThinkShield, you can enjoy up to four layers of end-to-end protection from Hardware so that the Android Software is cleaned and your privacy and data stay well protected.
product_description.Android 11: With Android 11, your mobile phone will be more intuitive, safe, personal, and more. It gives you powerful controls and smoother ways to control your privacy settings and much more.
product_description.4 GB RAM + 64 GB Storage: This mobile phone features up to 4 GB of RAM so that you can enjoy powerful performance. With 64 GB inbuilt storage that can be expandable up to 1 TB. This way, you can conveniently store all your favourite photos, videos, and more.
product_description.2X2 MIMO Technology: With 2X2 MIMO technology, your mobile phone will ensure fast performance and smooth network connectivity so that you can smoothly use your phone for all your necessities.
product_description.IP52 Rated Water Repellent Design: Spills and splashes won’t ruin the functioning of this mobile phone, thanks to its IP52 rated water-repellent design.
product_description.Qualcomm Snapdragon 460 Processor: Thanks to the Qualcomm Snapdragon 460 processor, you can enjoy boosted performance that will make your gaming experience a lot more enjoyable. Your mobile phone ensures quick response and fast graphics rendering. You can also capture low-light images and make your pictures more mesmerising with AI.
product_description.Max Vision HD+ Display: This mobile phone features a 16.5 cm (6.5) Max Vision HD+ display with a suitable aspect ratio so that your favourite movies, photos, and more look more realistic on its ultra-wide screen. Thanks to the active area across the edge-to-edge display so that you can touch, tap, or swipe your phone with instant response.

review:
Let me be quick in writing all the goods and bads I felt about this cell phone.
Sound is very good, quiet loud, the speakers are of very decent quality.
Display is fine.
Rear Camera is good, produces decent pictures in daylight but there is some softness in the low light mode. Front camera also performs good in daylight mode....but in low light, it struggles to produce a decent picture. Camera AI is not up to the mark. It needs some upgradation.
The cell phone feels a bit heavy to me.
No bloatwares.
Does not come with any backcover.
Charging is very quick as it comes with a 20W Type C charger.
Face unlock is quick but I would not recomend you to use the face unlock as it unlocks even if your eyes are closed. Hence, anyone can easily unlock your phone while you are asleep.
Fingerprint sensor is good. Works fine.
This phone is not meant for high end gaming, so avoid this if you r a gamer.

Overall, at this price range, I personally feel that the phone is worth buying. Actually, I was bit confused whether to buy Samsung M12 or Moto G10 Power, as both comes with almost same specifications. I chose Moto and I don't regret buying it.

The phone is no doubt best in this budget if you want to experience pure stock android . Earlier I was thinking to buy poco / Xiaomi smartphone (at the time of purchase I was using redmi 4 ) but then somewhere in my heart I wanted to get out of that buggy bloated MIUI with so many ads (as a Xiaomi user myself ) . I have used Motorola smartphones before I got redmi 4 , so I thought to again buy a Motorola smartphone and I'm happy to say that it was the best choice.

I don't regret my decision at all.

1.It's camera is perfect according to this budget.
2. Absolutely loved it's back design although it is plastic but it comes with Matt finish due to which it doesn't catchs any fingerprints and smudges which is a good thing and it also feels premium.

3. Amazing battery life , in my usage it easily lasts for 2 days maybe more than that and I am a average user.

5. Speaker are decently loud.

And yes I forgot to mention Motorola gestures . These were another reason why I purchased Motorola g10 power.
They are so much helpful.

I love this purchase .

I am writing this review after using this smartphone for more than 20 days.

I got the phone on 18th of March and delivery is quiet decent
Coming towards phone review

1. Battery is long lasting and for normal users it lasts long upto 2 days without charge but if you are heavy user like me then you can get disappointed.
2. Camera rear and front both not really upto specially front camera so I''m disappointed but rear one is still good clicks decent pictures.
3. Processor is also quiet powerful as I am game lover and played free fire it's very smooth going and handles multitasking without lagging also does not heat despite such heavy usage.
4. Software is pure also not like other phones using their unnecessary UI for some rubbish reason
5. Lastly as I'm a moto user so kept this legacy carry forward got disappointed with camera but Its a quiet satisfying deal.
6.Sometimes some apps crashes.
7.Rating 4/5.

Hope the information is worthful for you guys.

I bought this phone for my kid for attending Online School classes and it is a good choice.

I purchased it for my dad. I was not sure about the performance before. I went through some reviews and I was convinced that the phone is okay for light users. I was more convinced with its build quality and 6000 mah battery. After receiving the phone, thanks to flipkart for 1 day delivery my dad stated using it. After few day I asked my dad about the phone and I was quite satisfied to hear that he is very happy with the phone. Stock android experience with smooth and good performance. The built quality is really good and single full charge lasts upto 2 days. My dad uses it mostly for watching web series and movies. No lag or heating issues. Awesome overall. I would strongly recommend it.

Most of its features as well as performance of the phone are good, except for the display. People looking for value for money, good performance, great battery life, fast charging, decent sound, etc. then this is a good buy. However, if you are someone looking for a good display or camera this will disappoint you. The brightness level of this phone at 80% is same as the brightness level of 30% in most other phones. Color contrast is very poor too. I am not comparing it with AMOLED displays, I am merely comparing it with TFT displays of other phones.

I am writting this review after usage of 10 days..

4. Decent rear cameras. Excellent at this price point.
5. Stock Android experience is awesome. No much gui related permission, all permissions are related to direct Google services and applications.phone is clean.
5. Dedicated security folder to protect our important data's.
6. Think shield security platform.
7. Ip 62 splash proof rating at this price segment

Cons.
1. Display is pretty only the backlight brightness we need to keep at 70% ( it is not a big concern). At this brightness settings display is pretty good.

The phone is good for normal usage. It is okay for the people doesn't consume too much of online content, videos as the display is not that best. The camera is not great at all even it is 48MP on paper. However from budget point of view it is good. The good things of this phone are that it is stock android/clean ui, good battery life, speakers. Performance is good on this phone but might not be best for heavy gaming.

Writing this review after 2 weeks of usage.

*Excellent battery backup (for normal usage it stays up to 3 days)
*Display quality is good. Worth for money
*Sound clarity is good and decent
*With 4GB of RAM performance is excellent
*Latest Android version with smooth functionality


Cons:
*Even though the camera capacity is 48mgp, picture and video quality is low.

*It's a heavy weight phone due to the high battery capacity.

Over all, worth for money when you are ready to compromise with the normal camera quality and phone weight.

Not recommended for Heavy users and Multitaskers. Battery is the main selling point of this cellphone. And I like it's stock android. Camera is ok, processor is ok, though it lags sometimes. Moto gestures are great. Cellphone body is robust.

If you are not a heavy user then this phone will be great for you.

Battery - That 6000 mAh brick is just gold for backup. I bought it for my father and it's his first smartphone. The battery drained from 100% to 60% in 3 days on minimal usage. Data was turned off. He mostly uses it for voice calling. Standby backup is also very good which is a plus.

Screen- It's HD+. It would have been better if it was FHD+. Screen quality is not that good but it's okay for a HD+ screen. Quality could have been better.

Software- Stock android is pure gold. It's clean with all necessary functions without any crap. For my father, it's best.

Camera- Real camera is okay if not very good for this price range but front camera is just crap. Front camera clicks worst shot in this price range.

Processor- SD480 handles all the day-to-day tasks easily while also being power efficient.

Weight and Form Factor- Weight is about 220g which is little heavy but it's mainly due to that 6000 mAh brick. Form factor is also good.

Conclusion- This phone is made for old age people who need a clean UI and great software experience with decent enough battery backup. It's not for gaming or photoholic people. It can be used for online classes thanks to its 6000 mAh brick.

I am little bit not satisfied with the camera but the overall performance of the phone is quite good.
Especial mention about the battery, on normal usage (call, whatsapp, YouTube) the phone runs for around 72hours. Refresh rate is good and performance of Snapdragon processor 732G is very good.

Practical Phone


Basics of this phone are done right.

- Good speakers (both loudspeaker and earpiece)
- Great battery and fast charger
- Good call clarity, proximity sensor works properly
- Solid build
- Clean UI free from junk, spywares and ads
- Overall very decent smartphone experience
- Perfect for the budget oriented and for the elderly

Quite a well balanced phone in this price range.

Pros:
1. battery backup is extra ordinarily good. I am getting around 12 hrs. of screen time and don't need to charge for two days with excessive usage and three days with normal usage.
2.Design and weight balance is done very well, doesn't feel like you are holding a brick (as MI/ Poco phones does), despite the fact it has 6000 mAH battery.
3. Clean software near stock android experience, software is so clean that its a sigh of relief after switching back to it from MIUI. (earlier had POCO M3).
4. Android 11 OOB+ Moto gestures are very handful.
5. Audio Output is quite balanced even if its not a stereo speaker.
6. Night mode is doing a decent job.

Cons:
1. Front Camera quality isn't unto the mark, photos are too soft.
2. Screen resolution is only 720p and not Full HD, but I guess its the main reason for such a great battery backup.
3. Phone case isn't provided in the box.


Overall its cons are just rebalancing kind of decisions and not Cons. Hope front Camera issue will be fixed with an update.

This is probably the worst Motorola smartphone I've bought. I began using smartphones in 2014, began with a Motog4, then along the years used Motog5s, Motog7, MotoPower. I've had pleasant user experience therefore I stuck to Motorola.
The Motog10 bought in mid March 2021 is an extremely stubborn, user unfriendly piece of equipment. It deliberately keeps switching to the sim data although full, strong Wifi is present while at my home and office. Even if I switch off the sim data in WiFi zone, it just refuses to connect to the WiFi. The phone prefers NOT to function the apps in the absence of sim data being ON. I use my old Motog5s on another sim card in the same conditions mentioned above. The fact that the Motog5s functions normally is testimony enough that the Motog10 is by far behaving very, very stubbornly!
Another major shortcoming in the Motog10 is the alarming rate at which it dials the Emergency Number (somedays 10-15 times daily!). This happens when you sense your finger on sensor reader as well as when one manually depress the display on/off button. I truly didn't expect such a miserable, stubborn product from Motorola and regret very much my decision to continue with their products.

I am not an Android Fanboy, my primary device runs on iOS; basically, I keep an Android device as a second option or as a backup. I have shifted to Moto from Nokia device, what I bought back in November 2017. So, I needed a cheaper device with long battery support and runs on latest version. It fitted the bill and I ordered. I have an Anti-Samsung and Anti-Chinese brand (originally) agenda in me, that’s why I don’t like those. Now, Motorola has its origin in US, later it was sold to Google and after that, to Lenovo. However, this phone is manufactured in India and mainly for Indian market only, so I made my mind to bought it, finding no better option from Nokia. Now talking about Flipkart, I ordered this phone at 9PM at night and it arrived next day at 2PM, however it was to be delivered in 3 days time. So… Thank you Flipkart!
